name: The Tomb of Osiris
description:
The Tomb Of Osiris is our submission to the Spring 2019 UE4 Gamejam

While exploring the western desert of Egypt you stumble upon a mysterious temple.

You think you've  hit the jackpot by taking a large golden coin, but then the world turns upside down and you discover its other side, you are not in a temple, but in a tomb!

Figure out how to get out, or stay there forever.
